physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Facial and tongue weakness, MRC grade 3/5 proximal arm weakness, 3/5 hip girdle and quadriceps weakness, hypoactive or absent tendon reflexes, mild reduction to pain and vibration in the distal third of the legs, no spontaneous fasciculations.

Mild-to-moderate facial and tongue weakness, MRC grade 4/5 proximal and symmetric upper limb weakness, 4/5 hand muscle weakness, 3/5 hip girdle, and 4/5 quadriceps muscle weakness, absent tendon reflexes, pan-modality sensory loss in the distal third of the legs, mild gynecomastia.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Worsening proximal weakness and development of bilateral grip weakness over the last 2-3 years.
